meanings.definition: Determine the limits or boundaries of something.
meanings.sent1: The fence delimits the garden from the rest of the yard.
meanings.sent2: The map clearly delimits the area of the national park.
meanings.sent3: The chalk line delimits where the game can be played.
meanings.sent4: Her smile delimits the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sign delimits the start of the hiking trail with a bold arrow.

meanings.definition: Set the boundaries or limits of something.
meanings.sent1: The rules delimits how far players can move on the board.
meanings.sent2: The contract delimits the responsibilities of each party involved.
meanings.sent3: The teacher delimits the time for each student's presentation.
meanings.sent4: His dedication delimits the extent of his success.
meanings.sent5: The fence delimits the property with a clear boundary.
